abstract: The multibillionaire presidential candidate who has flooded the country with television and digital ads has received a second extension from the Federal Election Commission.
lead_paragraph: Michael R. Bloomberg, a multibillionaire who has flooded the country with more than $200 million in television and digital ads in his first two months as a presidential candidate, has requested and received an extension that will allow him to keep details of his vast personal fortune hidden until after millions of Americans vote in the 2020 primary.
